name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable AI Overview | Turn Off AI Overview

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables or Turn Off AI Overview in Google search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Disable AI Overview | Turn Off AI Overview" disables or hides the AI Overview section in Google Search. Just install this light weight extension and It will Turn of AI Overview result by hiding it from Search Page.  

AI Overview in Google Search is an AI-powered feature designed to give users quick summaries and key information at a glance. This can be beneficial for quickly understanding a topic, but it has its drawbacks. Some users find it distracting, and others prefer to see search results in the traditional format without AI summaries. And sometimes it provides incorrect information.

Since its launch on 14 May 2024, it has seen a lot of backlash from Users and SEOs so we have come up with a solution for you to get rid of this AI Overview and keep the Search Results page clean and distraction-free for you to explore organic pages on SERP.
